attributes.action: Help the burning Iranian oil tanker SANCHI - Rescue the 32 crew on board.
attributes.additional_details:
Its been a week since the accident that the oil tanker SANCHI has been involved and There has been little efforts to rescue the 32 crew members of this Tanker.  We as an international citizens and students of United Kingdom (a multi-national country ) would urge and request that UK authorities to ensure and  put as much effort as possible in order to rescue the crew members of this tanker via the help of Royal Navy, British Red Crescent, International Committee of the Red Cross and other international resources to rescue the 32 crew members of SANCHI Oil Tanker please. 

Your Efforts are our Hopes to the future !
attributes.background:
Dear UK Government, British RED Cross and International Committee of the Red Cross: 
We the Iranian citizens and students of UK would immensely urge you to rescue the 32 Crew member of the burning oil tanker SANCHI which is sadly has involved an accident. 
Please remember the Chilean miners !

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions that call on the UK Government and Parliament to act. We can't accept petitions that call on charities and NGOs to take action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
